thread.title: Heat stroke: How it can be costly even in cooler temperatures
thread.title_full: Heat stroke: How it can be costly even in cooler temperatures - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Heat stroke: How it can be costly even in cooler temperatures
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - An autopsy finds that heat stroke killed Vermont State Trooper Kyle Young. The 28-year-old trooper died last Thursday while trying out for the state police swat team. We don't often hear of deaths by heat stroke in Vermont.
Dr. Joseph Hagan spoke to with us about heat stroke. He says even in cooler temperatures, the illness can be life-threatening.
Watch the video for more information.
